name: Boost to the Other Side Many Times (Sprint 3)
name_original: Boost to the Other Side Many Times (Sprint 3)
description:
Controls:

Press 'a' to turn left. Press 'd' to turn right. Press spacebar to boost.

PRESS 'R' TO RESTART FROM LAST CHECKPOINT

Notes:

There is a level select screen inside the main menu. There is also sound which can be adjusted in the menu. If you are really bad then press Shift + C to make yourself invincible.

Feedback Form: https://forms.gle/SwLiVtqNgAbQeCnG6

Tip: Go slow on the hard bits.
